li.label: painful bond tearing
li.description: To witness the bond torn so cruelly felt like a wound shared by all. There was a somber silence as if even the air around us held its breath in sorrow.

li.label: mediocre bond tearing
li.description: The ritual felt incomplete, as if the bond had slipped away rather than been properly honored. There’s a lingering unease, like the loss was half-hearted and unresolved.

li.label: bittersweet bond tearing
li.description: Though the bond has been parted, there’s a sense of peace in the air. We feel both the pain of loss and the gratitude for a bond cherished, leaving us quietly contemplative.

li.label: reverent bond tearing
li.description: As the bond dissolved, we were enveloped by a deep reverence. There is a sacred beauty in this farewell, one that fills us with awe and respect for the strength of their connection.

li.label: sorrowful pyre funeral
li.description: A disappointing, empty ceremony; the flames barely touched the departed’s memory, and whispers of discontent linger in the air. Few felt any peace from the farewell.

li.label: muted pyre funeral
li.description: A quiet, unremarkable ceremony; the fire held steady, yet there was no special spark or blessing. A respectful farewell, though the memory feels incomplete.

li.label: honored pyre funeral
li.description: A dignified, respectful farewell; the flames rose with grace, and there was a sense that the departed’s spirit left in calm and honor. Many left feeling at peace with the passing.

li.label: radiant pyre funeral
li.description: A deeply moving, unforgettable send-off; the flames roared with a beauty only dragons could inspire, and warmth lingered in the hearts of those present. The departed’s memory feels enshrined in fire, as it should be.
